Resolve directory with embedded <site>, <site_name>, or <share>

Source: R/resolve_dir.R
resolve_dir.Rd

Resolve directory with embedded <site>, <site_name>, or <share>

Usage

resolve_dir(dir, site, share = site_name)

Arguments

dir

Directory path

site

Site name. For Google Drive, use site_name; on Unity, use tolower(site), 3 letter code

share

Share site name. For Google Drive, use share

Value

Directory path including specified site.

On this page

Developed by Bradley Compton.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
